1.0.name: wordpress/auto-junction
1.0.description: This plugin will find products and display them at the bottom of your blog posts or where you want them displayed. Using the custom fields for each post you enter the keywords and this plugin will get a list of products related to those keywords. This way when a blog post is viewed you can also show affiliate products related to that post.
